Get the Christmas spirit in Bangkok! The festive season is in a full bloom around Ratchaprasong and Pathumwan areas where buildings dazzle with lights, displays, and music. Come along! https://t.co/UUrnHfJHmh #nokair #SmilingAcrossAsia https://t.co/quplBVcTpp

If you’re planning to visit Samui, Nok Air has Nok Transfer: Samui-on-Island ready at Nathon Pier to drop you off anywhere on the island! https://t.co/87bxRIbv9d #nokair #NokTransfer https://t.co/OfFpucB6ew
It's Holiday! Book your tickets with Nok Air today until 4 Jan 2018, lowest fares from 650 THB, free seat selection included >> https://t.co/67WetOcXxm #nokair https://t.co/qRUbjpUfm8

You can check in on Nok Air mobile application. It is easy and simple as that. Mobile Check-in service is available from 24 hours prior to the scheduled departure time for a domestic flight #nokair https://t.co/gU3hfV7CrR
It's Holiday! Book your tickets with Nok Air today until 28 Dec 2017, lowest fares from 650 THB, free seat selection included >> https://t.co/67WetOcXxm #nokair https://t.co/Jrkop5knDK

Shwemawdaw Pagoda is the highest pagoda in Myanmar. It's believed that if you stick a joss stick into the remains, your life will be prolonged and will never go downhill. Fly with Nok Air's Weekday Special to Yangon, lowest fares from 1,099 THB https://t.co/g5YdF0H479 #nokair https://t.co/MGYvTXLFU1

Leave your tiring days behind and escape to the paradise of Ranong. Nok Air helps ease you from any troubles Nok Transfer: Airport-to-Town that will drive you from the airport and drop you off in the downtown area. Book now https://t.co/g5YdF0psIz #nokair #SmilingAcrossAsia https://t.co/EKeGd1GDuL

Nok Air's Weekday Special lowest fares from 699 THB/person, free seat selection included. Booking can be made between 14-20 Dec 2017 and fly 21 Dec 2017 – 30 Sep 2018 https://t.co/g5YdF0H479 #nokair https://t.co/bZF69RzNgl

It's lunch time! Nok Air recommends “Chao tom or sugarcane shrimp” the Vietnamese delicacy which is popular worldwide for your lunch today. Fly with Nok Air's Duo Pack to Vietnam to try authentic Chao tom starting from 1,050 THB. Book now https://t.co/pulbInILwf #nokair https://t.co/oH1RFC8T5R

data.text: Fly to Bangkok with Nok Air and stay for 2 nights in the central area starting only from 2,500 THB/person. Book your package now with Nok Holidays at https://t.co/mh2phyeUYk #nokair #NokHolidays https://t.co/5DGftZTd16

Buy a ticket for two with Nok Air’s “Duo Pack”, price starts at 499 THB/person. Book by 13 Dec 2017 for the flights from 15 Dec 2017 to 30 Sep 2018 https://t.co/0qRvTeOAzZ #nokair https://t.co/ntxp5XfJaU

Whether it be Airport Check-in, Mobile Check-in or Web Check-in, please spare you check-in time 45 minutes before the departure time in case of domestic flight and 1 hour before the departure time for international flight #nokair #SmilingAcrossAsia https://t.co/qrALOvTrF0
